animeTitle: Mobile Suit Gundam: The Witch from Mercury - Prologue
otherNames: Kidou Senshi Gundam: Suisei no Majo - Prologue, 機動戦士ガンダム 水星の魔女 PROLOGUE
synopsis: The prologue of Mobile Suit Gundam THE WITCH FROM MERCURY. Set to release this summer before the broadcast of the TV anime series in October 2022, it will be shown for the first time at "GUNDAM NEXT FUTURE -LINK THE UNIVERSE-", an event that will take place across venues such as GUNDAM FACTORY YOKOHAMA and THE GUNDAM BASE Virtual World, and later on released at other events all over the world, such as San Diego Comic-Con 2022.
